entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is Ron's owl, described as hooting happily and soaring through the air.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a third-year student at Hogwarts, described as snapping at the third-year girls and waving his fist with Pigwidgeon on it.

entities.name: pigwidgeon's leg
entities.description: Pigwidgeon's leg is where Sirius's reply was attached.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who sent a reply to Harry through Pigwidgeon.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is where Ron, Harry, and Hermione went to read Sirius's reply.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who received a letter from Sirius through Pigwidgeon.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who sat with Ron and Harry in the common room.

relationships.description: Ron owns Pigwidgeon, as evidenced by him waving his fist with Pigwidgeon on it.
Sirius sent a letter to Harry through Pigwidgeon.
Ron went to Gryffindor Tower with Harry and Hermione to read Sirius's reply.
Harry received a letter from Sirius through Pigwidgeon.
